Conor Delaney

Counselling & Psychotherapy Services

Dublin based therapist providing a safe space to explore life and encourage healing.

My aim is to guide you along a path of positive change.

Life is full of ups and downs, and as humans we often need guidance during tough times.

A safe therapeutic relationship can help us to heal, improve and lead a happier and healthier lifestyle.

Learn more about Conor Delaney Therapy

About

My Services

Conor believes psychotherapy is a powerful journey of self-discovery and approaches therapy non-judgmentally and with compassion.

In this warm, empathetic and challenging environment, clients can safely explore themselves and their issues. Find out how therapy could impact your life and what services you can access.

Services
“

After years of juggling between different forms of therapy, Conor helped me to finally find a safe space to deal with ongoing issues. His help has led me to lead a much happier life, and I now have practical ways of dealing with my stress and anxiety.

- Hannah, Dublin
